label: Alchemist
descriptionHtml:
• Armor increased by 1
  • Unstable Concoctionmax damage increased from 120/180/240/300 to 130/200/270/340

label: Batrider
descriptionHtml:
• Flamebreakis now a targeted AoE spell
    • It no longer explodes on the first unit in a path
    • It travels towards the targeted destination and does its effect there
    • Projectile speed 900 (instead of 750)

label: Bristleback
descriptionHtml: • Quill Spraydamage cap increased from 180 to 220

label: Centaur Warrunner
descriptionHtml:
• Great Fortitudestrength bonus increased from 12/24/36 to 15/30/45
  • Returnbase damage increased from 16 to 16/18/20/22

label: Clinkz
descriptionHtml:
• Death Pactdamage bonus increased from 4/6/8% to 5/6.5/8%
  • Death Pact hp bonus increased from 50/60/70% to 50/65/80%

label: Clockwerk
descriptionHtml: • Power CogsHP/Mana drain increased from 55/70/85/100 to 60/90/120/150

label: Crystal Maiden
descriptionHtml: • Freezing FieldAoE increased by 100 (Explosion AoE adjusted to keep damage probabilities equivalent)

label: Dark Seer
descriptionHtml:
• Wall of Replicaillusions take 300% damage (up from 250%)
  • Wall of Replica Aghanim bonus no longer creates allied illusions
  • Wall of Replica Aghanim bonus now increases illusion damage from 70/80/90 to 100/120/140% instead

label: Doom
descriptionHtml: • Level Deathbonus damage increased from 250 to 275

label: Drow Ranger
descriptionHtml: • SilenceAoE increased from 275 to 300

label: Ember Spirit
descriptionHtml:
• Armor reduced by 1
  • Base Strength decreased from 21 to 19
  • Flame Guardhealth barrier reduced from 100/250/400/550 to 50/200/350/500
  • Fire Remnantdamage decreased from 140/180/220 to 120/160/200
  • Searing Chainstargets decreased from 3 to 2 random units

label: Enigma
descriptionHtml: • Black Holenow prevents heroes being Forced out with Force Staff

label: Gyrocopter
descriptionHtml:
• Homing Missilemaximum damage (at 2k range) increased from 100/200/300/400 to 110/220/330/440
  • Rocket Barragedamage increased from 10/13/16/19 to 11/14/17/20

label: Invoker
descriptionHtml:
• Chaos Meteordamage increased from 80+Exort*30 to 80+Exort*35
  • Chaos Meteor land time decreased from 1.5 to 1.3
  • EMPcan no longer hit Invulnerable/Tornadoed units
  • EMP cooldown increased from 25 to 30 seconds
  • Sun Strikedamage type changed from Magical to Pure
  • Sun Strike now reveals the area it will hit before the damage impact
  • Tornadocooldown increased from 25 to 30 seconds
  • Tornado Damage decreased from 77.5+(Wex+Quas)×23 to 70+(Wex+Quas)×20

label: Juggernaut
descriptionHtml: • Omnislashnow gives Juggernaut 200flying visionduring its duration

label: Keeper of the Light
descriptionHtml: • Mana Leakstun duration increased from 1.25/1.5/1.75/2 to 1.3/1.6/1.9/2.2

label: Kunkka
descriptionHtml:
• TorrentAOE increased from 200 to 215
  • X Marks The Spotcooldown decreased from 20 to 16 seconds
  • Ghost Shipstun duration increased from 1.2 to 1.4

label: Legion Commander
descriptionHtml: • Moment of Couragecooldown increased from 0.9 to 1.2

label: Lina
descriptionHtml:
• Fiery Soulattack speed bonus increased from 30/40/50/60 to 40/50/60/70
  • Fiery Soul movement speed bonus increased from 3/4/5/6 to 4/5/6/7%

label: Lion
descriptionHtml:
• Voodoocooldown increased from 13 to 15
  • Voodoo mana cost increased from 110/140/170/200 to 125/150/175/200
  • Voodoo duration increased from 1.25/2/2.75/3.5 to 1.75/2.5/3.25/4

label: Luna
descriptionHtml: • Moon Glaivedamage decrease per bounce decreased from 35% to 30%

label: Magnus
descriptionHtml: • Skewerwill now cast in the direction you targeted if you cast it beyond the max range

label: Medusa
descriptionHtml: • Split Shotnow shoots 5 arrows instead of 4

label: Mirana
descriptionHtml: • Moonlight Shadowcooldown decreased from 180/160/140 to 160/140/120

label: Morphling
descriptionHtml:
• Morphpassively grants 3/4/5/6 agility and strength
  • Waveformnow properly dodges projectiles

label: Naga Siren
descriptionHtml:
• ChangedRip Tidecast mechanism
    • Rip Tide now casts in a 450 aoe around Naga and all of her illusions
    • Enemies can be fully affected by the Illusion's aoe
    • The effect does not stack
    • No longer uses cast point

label: Nature's Prophet
descriptionHtml:
• Wrath of Naturemana cost increased from 150/175/200 to 150/200/250
  • Teleportationmana cost no longer decreases per level (constant 50)

label: Nyx Assassin
descriptionHtml:
• Urna Swarmreplaced with a new spell
    • Urna Swarm will be reused for a future hero

label: Necrophos
descriptionHtml:
• Heartstopperdamage increased from 0.5/0.7/0.9/1.1 to 0.6/0.8/1/1.2
  • Sadistlevel 4 mana regen increased from 48 to 60

label: Ogre Magi
descriptionHtml:
• Added Aghanim's Scepter
    • Gives his other head the ability to cast a more primitive version of Fireblast
    • It has a constant (not modified by ultimate/level) 275 damage, 1.5 second stun, 20 cooldown, 400 mana cost
    • It can trigger multicast
    • This is an independent 5th skill added to his ability card

label: Phantom Assassin
descriptionHtml:
• Phantom Strikecast range increased from 700/800/900/1000 to 1000
  • Phantom Strike cooldown rescaled from 20/15/10/5 to 14/11/8/5

label: Puck
descriptionHtml:
• Ethereal Jauntnow dodges projectiles
  • Phase Shiftautocast removed
  • Phase Shift mana cost removed
  • Phase Shift level 4 duration increased from 3 to 3.25 seconds
  • Aghanim UpgradedDream Coilno longer increases the mana cost from the base spell

label: Pugna
descriptionHtml:
• Decrepifycast range increased from 550/600/650/700 to 700
  • Life Draindamage increased from 100/150/200 to 120/160/200 (with Aghanim's from 175/225/275 to 180/240/300)

label: Queen of Pain
descriptionHtml: • Shadow Strikeinitial damage increased from 50/70/70/100 to 50/75/100/125

label: Razor
descriptionHtml: • Unstable Currentdamage increased from 40/60/80/100 to 40/70/100/130

label: Shadow Fiend
descriptionHtml:
• Necromasterynow gives 6 souls for killing a hero (instead of 1)
  • Necromastery soul count increased from 8/16/24/32 to 12/20/28/36

label: Skywrath Mage
descriptionHtml:
• Base Intelligence increased by 3
  • Arcane Boltbonus intelligence damage increased from 1.5x to 1.6x
  • Arcane Bolt mana cost decreased from 90 to 70
  • Concussive Shotcooldown now scales from 20 to 20/19/18/17

label: Sniper
descriptionHtml: • Headshotdamage increased from 30/30/40/50 to 30/40/50/60

label: Storm Spirit
descriptionHtml: • Ball Lightningnow properly dodges projectiles

label: Techies
descriptionHtml: • Attack range increased from 650 to 700

label: Templar Assassin
descriptionHtml: • Psi Bladesbonus range increased from 40/100/160/220 to 60/120/180/240

label: Timbersaw
descriptionHtml: • Timber Chaindamage increased from 80/120/160/200 to 100/140/180/220

label: Tinker
descriptionHtml: • March of the Machinesduration increased from 5 to 6 seconds

label: Troll Warlord
descriptionHtml: • Battle Tranceattack speed bonus increased from 60/100/140 to 60/120/180

label: Viper
descriptionHtml:
• Poison Attackdamage increased from 6/12/18/24 to 10/16/22/28
  • Fixed Poison Attack damage not being lethal

label: Visage
descriptionHtml:
• Familiar's armor increased from 0 to 0/1/2
  • Gravekeeper's Cloakrecovery time decreased from 14/12/10/8 to 12/10/8/6

label: Warlock
descriptionHtml:
• Infernal'sPermanent Immolationdamage increased from 20/30/40 to 30/40/50 per second
  • Shadow Wordduration increased from 8 to 9 seconds

label: Animal Courier
descriptionHtml: • Courier cost decreased from 170 to 150

label: Bloodstone
descriptionHtml: • HP regen increased by 1 to equal the sum of its parts

label: Ethereal Blade
descriptionHtml: • Ether Blastslow increased from 60% to 80%

label: Eye of Skadi
descriptionHtml: • Cold Attackslow duration increased from 2/4 (range/melee) to 3/5

label: Flying Courier
descriptionHtml: • Flying Courier cost increased from 200 to 220

label: Mjollnir
descriptionHtml: • Mjollnir'sStatic Shockcan now be cast on non-hero units as well (like Infernals)

label: Tranquil Boots
descriptionHtml:
• Can now bedisassembled
  • Damage instances before breaking increased from 3 to 4
  • Rejuvenateheal increased from 150 to 170

label: Sange and Yasha
descriptionHtml: • Sange and Yasha can now bedisassembled

label: Veil of Discord
descriptionHtml: • Discordduration increased from 15 to 20 seconds

label: General updates
descriptionHtml: • AddedWisp,Disruptor, andRubicktoCaptains Mode

label: General updates
descriptionHtml: • Courier death team bounty can only trigger while no couriers are dead

label: General updates
descriptionHtml: • Courier death team bounty from 150 to 175

label: General updates
descriptionHtml: • Added a new ability on the courier to go to the secret shop

label: General updates
descriptionHtml: • Removed Unexplored Fog of War

label: General updates
descriptionHtml: • Cheese no longer requires 5 mana to use

label: General updates
descriptionHtml: • Range creeps mana pool increased from 300 to 500

label: General updates
descriptionHtml: • Harpy's Chain Lightning cooldown from 6 to 4 seconds

label: General updates
descriptionHtml: • Satyr Trickster purge mana cost decreased from 150 to 120

label: General updates
descriptionHtml: • Satyr Hellcaller HP regen aura increased from 3 to 4

label: Bug fixes
descriptionHtml:
• Fixed a bug with Fire Remnant targeting and Essence Aura
  • Fixed Moment of Courage not having a learn hotkey
  • Fixed a fatal error possible with Tether
  • Fixed a bug with Fire Remnant when cast on self
  • Fixed Psi Blades not affecting a very small area right behind the initial target
  • Fixed Forged Spirits dying instantly when affected by Smoke of Deceit
